txt.en: You should listen to Thrymm and Cyneberg.
'Now... now we can defeat Núrzum, or die trying. We have Thrymm, and we have so much more knowledge of our foe.'
Instance: A Trail of Vengeance

'I am well now, [placeholder]. The joy overwhelmed me, for I thought all hope was lost.

'Thrymm, why did you not return to us? I knew you were alive, but no one believed me!

'I searched everywhere for you.'
Follow Cyneberg
You should listen to Thrymm and Cyneberg.
TBD
Reassure Thrymm that Cyneberg is all right
Listen to Thrymm and Cyneberg
You should listen to Thrymm and Cyneberg.
Cyneberg has no hope, but is willing to explore further
Talk to Cyneberg
'What do you think, [placeholder]?'
See if Cyneberg is feeling better

You tell Cyneberg that you have a strange feeling about the trail of fallen Orcs. Cyneberg looks at you, puzzled, but shrugs.\n\n'If you wish to live in denial of our doom a little longer, I am not one to criticize.'
You appear to have come upon a trail of vengeance, left by a mysterious warrior whose deeds strongly resemble Thrymm's....
Cyneberg is in the northern High Knolls.\n\nYou should follow Cyneberg.
Cyneberg is in the northern High Knolls.\n\nYou should follow Cyneberg.

'Do we continue to follow this trail, or do we admit our defeat and return to Forlaw?'

You tell Cyneberg that you have a strange feeling about the trail of felled Orcs. Cyneberg shrugs in reply.

'If you wish to live in denial of our doom a little longer, I am not one to criticize.'
Cyneberg is in the northern High Knolls.\n\nYou should follow Cyneberg.
Cyneberg is in the northern High Knolls.\n\nYou should follow Cyneberg.
Talk to Cyneberg
Cyneberg is in the northern High Knolls.\n\nYou should follow Cyneberg.
Listen to Cyneberg
Talk to Cyneberg
'I cannot wait to see Gárwig's face when he sees that Thrymm is alive!\n\n'Let us leave at once. We must prepare for battle.'
TBD
Cyneberg is in the northern High Knolls.\n\nYou should follow Cyneberg.
Listen to Cyneberg
Thrymm is in the northern High Knolls.\n\nYou should speak with Thrymm.
Listen to Cyneberg
Listen to Cyneberg
Thrymm and Cyneberg are in Thrymm's cave in the northern High Knolls.
A look of relief passes over Thrymm's face

'Is she ill? I cannot bear to lose her now that I have found her again. I thought everyone dead!'

You assure Thrymm that Cyneberg is as healthy as can be.

The shock of seeing Thrymm alive when she had given up hope seems to have overwhelmed her.
